original: yeah3 (yeah) situation_handled (tell me about a situation that you wish you had handled differently)
traduit: Oui3 (ouais) situation_handled (dis-moi une situation que tu souhaites avoir traitée différemment)

original: well i was just telling you about um it was it was my mother's husband and to tell you the truth um i could've handled that differently but when i seen the look in my mama's eyes of fear i just lost it and i snapped you know i told my mother uh like um i don't like this uh you need you need to take care of this because i'm don't know how long i can keep my composure as far as this 'cause i've been seeing this guy mistreat my mother mistreat my mother but that's her husband and so i kept my distance in their relationship but when i saw her having fear in her eyes that triggered a part of me um that i don't like very much because i know if i get angry i usually stay angry for a long time so i should've just left i should've just left and then went home and rested and got up in the next morning went to church but um yeah it we had a big time explosion and that created and that created a lot of damage for about six to nine months so yeah those six nine months i can't get back
traduit: Je te disais juste que c'était le mari de ma mère et que pour te dire la vérité, j'aurais pu gérer ça différemment, mais quand j'ai vu le regard de ma mère dans les yeux de la peur, je l'ai perdu et j'ai craqué, tu sais que j'ai dit à ma mère que je n'aime pas que tu aies besoin de prendre soin de ça parce que je ne sais pas combien de temps je peux garder mon sang-froid aussi loin que ça parce que j'ai vu ce type maltraiter ma mère maltraite ma mère mais c'est son mari et j'ai donc gardé ma distance dans leur relation, mais quand je l'ai vue avoir peur dans ses yeux qui a déclenché une partie de moi, je n'aime pas beaucoup parce que je sais que si je m'énerve, je reste en colère pendant longtemps, alors j'aurais dû partir juste pour rentrer chez moi et me reposer et me lever le lendemain, je suis allé à l'église, mais euh oui, nous avons eu une explosion de grand temps et cela a créé beaucoup de dégâts pendant environ six à neuf mois, alors ces six mois je ne peux pas revenir

original: well my brother's in prison um i haven't seem him in twenty years he's been there twenty years my sister moved to chicago thirteen years ago i haven't seen her since then so i'm only close to my mother and um my son i haven't seen him in five years and i'm still looking for him and waiting for the day i see him again and how that's gonna turn out for me i've just you know i have small family and i have family in chicago but i don't mess around with that side of the family just just because um of what i seen and heard so i just don't want it to happen to me at all so i just keep my distance
traduit: Eh bien mon frère est en prison, je ne l'ai pas vu depuis vingt ans, il y a vingt ans, ma sœur a déménagé à Chicago il y a treize ans, je ne l'ai pas vue depuis, donc je ne suis proche que de ma mère et de mon fils, je ne l'ai pas vu depuis cinq ans, et je le cherche toujours et j'attends le jour où je le revois et comment ça va se passer pour moi, j'ai juste une petite famille et j'ai de la famille à Chicago, mais je ne me fous pas de ce côté de la famille juste parce que j'ai vu et entendu, alors je ne veux pas que ça m'arrive du tout.

original: someone who's been a positive influence <inf> influence in my life i would say scrubbed_entry taught me how to get my temper under control and how to express my emotions without me <m>  me expressing my emotions being threatening to someone else and taught taught me how how to like monitor my emotions and monitor my thoughts and how strong my thoughts are and when they're really strong that's when i just need to be quiet until that intense fizzling subsides and then i can speak rationally and not just emotionally um and of course um he's he was the one that encouraged <enc> told me that i should look into being a drug and alcohol counselor um he got twenty seven years clean and sober right now he used to live on skid row and he <h> the way he changed his life around and you know the way he approached me as a father was just something that i'll never forget

original: how i been feeling lately i just been feeling like that things are about to start going better for me um making some better decisions um taking advantage of the opportunities that come to me taking advantage of my talents taking advantage of meeting the right people that can um open the right doors for me so i'm very enthusiastic about that even if it doesn't happen i'll send out a million resumes i don't care if i get five interviews i'm i will never stop because i know know that being a counselor is my life mission and and um i'm also destined to be a writer and it's just a matter of time before my book is out there and people um know about me because i've had a lot of time to study human behavior and things like that and i have a lot to offer humanity so it's just a matter of time before um the that the public is exposed to what um i've been gathering

original: my behavior i'm more mellow um i laugh more more humorous i let a lot of things go that i used to just let tick me off and anger me and things that i can't control like trying to control people or or or trying to make sure people don't betray me and mm you <y> you just can't control that i think i matured mentally and psychologically eh and the um acquisition of a sense of humor was a major major breakthrough for me so i know my thoughts have changed and with my thoughts changing my behavior has changed i still have to monitor it um my thoughts and my behavior i still have to monitor them but overall i'm you know um back then i just tolerated myself now i um actually like myself and um it will behoove <beh> behoove you to feel the same way

original: um i wish i would've never well obviously i wish i would've never went to prison um i wish that i could change well um my economic status my employment status and um my teeth that's like a problem area for me i did a lot of stupid things years ago and they caught up with me and i didn't take care of my teeth and now that i need to be um confident about myself as i can be you know it always comes up every now and then you know the thought like i wonder if they looking at my teeth i wonder if they're looking at my teeth i never get the sign <si> i never get the impression that they are but in the back of my mind there's these thoughts that says are they looking at my teeth so i would really change that and i would change my physical um size i think i would like to be at least thirty five pounds heavier but i'm working on it

original: yeah3 (yeah) Ellie17Dec2012_08 (what are you most proud of in your life)
traduit: Oui3 (oui) Ellie17Dec2012_08 (de quoi êtes-vous le plus fier dans votre vie)

original: i'm most proud of the fact that you know what i'm most proud of my mom really really um she graduated from school she had a full-time job she had a full-time job um she would wake up at five in the morning go to work get off her job at three thirty go straight to the college leave the college at nine o'clock at night she does this five days a week and still had the strength to maintain um she was on the dean's list and the president's list so doing all of this you know when they say xxx that older people can't do things i i just think that dispels that rumor um and she recently got her um license as a evangelist in the church so i'm just real proud of that and um her life has been affecting people in a in a positive way so yeah my mom
traduit: Je suis très fier du fait que vous savez ce que je suis le plus fier de ma mère vraiment um elle a obtenu son diplôme de l'école elle a eu un travail à temps plein um elle se réveillait à cinq heures du matin aller travailler se retirer de son travail à trois heures trente aller directement à l'université quitter le collège à neuf heures du soir elle fait cela cinq jours par semaine et avait toujours la force de maintenir um elle était sur la liste du doyen et la présidente ainsi faire tout cela vous savez quand ils disent xxx que les personnes plus âgées ne peuvent pas faire des choses je pense juste que cela dissipe cette rumeur um et elle a récemment obtenu son permis um en tant qu'évangéliste dans l'église alors je suis juste fier de cela et um sa vie a touché les gens d'une manière positive tellement oui ma mère
